recipesJson.name: creamed in your mouth
recipesJson.author: Conradvape
recipesJson.description: this is a straight up vanilla bean ice cream that you buy from the grocery store guys

reviews.text: Mixed up a 20ml of this, and wasn't expecting much. I just peeked into the stepping cabinet to try something different. It's been steeping sing 3/29/17. Very nice vape! Thick, creamy, and smooth. I really like it. Wish I would have mixed more. I think this is a great cream base to use with your favorite fruits. It's very good as it is though.. Thanks for sharing!
